LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartMedium.label: animal heart (medium)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartMedium.description:
Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyMedium.label: animal kidney (medium)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyMedium.description:
Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverMedium.label: animal liver (medium)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverMedium.description:
Plays an important role in metabolism.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungMedium.label: animal lung (medium)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungMedium.description:
Essential part of the respiratory system.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperMedium.label: animal painstopper (medium)
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperMedium.description:
This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmMedium.label: bionic animal arm (medium)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmMedium.description:
One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarMedium.label: bionic animal ear (medium)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarMedium.description:
An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeMedium.label: bionic animal eye (medium)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeMedium.description:
Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegMedium.label: bionic animal leg (medium)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegMedium.description:
Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmMedium.label: prosthetic animal arm (medium)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmMedium.descript:
Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegMedium.label: prosthetic animal leg (medium)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegMedium.descript:
Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
